invocations.description: Sets the attack mode to attackmode and chase mode to chasemode within the client. It does not change any Targeting Attack Mode rules, which may revert your change immediately. Values can be 'offensive', 'balanced' or 'defensive' for attackmode, and 'stand' or 'chase' for chasemode.
Sets the attack mode to attackmode and chase mode to chasemod. attackmode can be 'offensive', 'balanced' or 'defensive'. chasemode can be 'stand' or 'chase'.
invocations.exDescription: Sets the client's attack mode to chase/offensive.
